results.content: A practical guide and a handy reference for designing API services. My suggestion to the instructor would be to additionally cover partial responses (limiting the fields) with an example and to add captions (not auto-generated) to the videos.
results.content_html: A practical guide and a handy reference for designing API services. My suggestion to the instructor would be to additionally cover partial responses (limiting the fields) with an example and to add captions (not auto-generated) to the videos.

results.content: Very methodically explained each topic step-by-step with full details.  I am really enjoying the course.
results.content_html: Very methodically explained each topic step-by-step with full details. I am really enjoying the course.

results.content:
This foundation course helped me understand the basics of REST APIs. I am much more confident in designing APIs, and the section that covers pagination and sorting is very informative.
Will recommend this for beginners and mid-level engineers.
results.content_html:
This foundation course helped me understand the basics of REST APIs. I am much more confident in designing APIs, and the section that covers pagination and sorting is very informative.
Will recommend this for beginners and mid-level engineers.

results.content: A nice course that explains the principles of Restful Design without boring or further ado. It may be even shorter, but it is possible to easily skip the places you find unnecessarly long and just read the slides and still understand the content of the lecture from the slides.
results.content_html: A nice course that explains the principles of Restful Design without boring or further ado. It may be even shorter, but it is possible to easily skip the places you find unnecessarly long and just read the slides and still understand the content of the lecture from the slides.
